description: Wondering how to cook lamb chops? This easy Mediterranean-inspired lamb chop recipe combines tomatoes, olives and feta in one tray.
keywords: Lamb Chop, Tomato And Feta Traybake
name: Lamb Chop, Tomato And Feta Traybake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pick sprigs from remaining oregano. Cut the remaining lemon into wedges. Scatter oregano sprigs over lamb. Serve with lemon wedges and bread.
